title: Memory Trace does not include alive or leak data for raft_router/apply_router
body: ## Bug Report ### What version of TiKV are you using? master ### What operating system and CPU are you using? ### Steps to reproduce We defined the raft_router_leak in tikv code, but that metrics' data is not reported to grafana. ### What did you expect? ### What did happened? alive and leak data are reported together.
